website_summaries.verdict: Choose between CD, AM-FM radio, AUX-in, or USB input. Sterling sound quality and clear display.
pros: Reliable Kenwood car stereo with easy to use controls and can play back various digital formats including FLAC files

website_summaries.verdict: CD receiver with USB and AM/FM tuner.
pros: Control and charge iPod or iPhone using USB connection
Built-in MOSFET amplifier (22 watts RMS/50 peak x 4 channels)
cons: Lacks some bells and whistles at this price point

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed and works great with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Easily installed and works great with iPhone! I used to have a charge cord plugged into a power port and then a separate aux cord for audio, but with this deck, I don't use the aux cord at all. I just plug the lightning cable directly into the deck and it charges and plays audio at the same time. Not only that, but the media controls on the deck and remote work to play/pause/FF/RW/skip tracks. Couldn't be happier and it's a great deck for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Hamling

customer_reviews.title: Simply does it. Plays music...
customer_reviews.text: Had a stock 1993 cassette/AM FM stereo in my civic. I needed something to listen to mp3s and the occasional CD. This is not a fancy high end deck, but it's a Kenwood and does what it suppose to do. Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: looking for a low cost but functional replacement for the stereo in my jeep wrangler. not having doors/windows most of the year i wanted a good stereo but not so good that it would be a target for "walking away". Detachable face if you want but honestly i just leave it on. being so open air i needed a stereo that would be typically set on the higher side of the volume scale and i have not had any issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: Barebones Unit that Performs Decently
customer_reviews.text: + >Cheap and simple replacement for single din applications. >Sounds OK with the sub pre-outs. Many sub options and EQ settings. >Bright and easy to read. >Front-access USB. - >Up\Down\Next\Prev track buttons are tiny and right next to the volume knob. >Volume knob doesn't feel right. No weight. >Remote has a range less than 10ft.
customer_reviews.author: SuperTurboExtraGnarly

customer_reviews.title: Works and sounds good despite 1 flaw
customer_reviews.text: After installation about 6 months ago I notice the sound quality overall improved , everything works great. My only complaint is I can’t talk on the phone and drive if connected to USB port. I have a iPhone 7 Plus so no headphone jack I usually play music with the usb and charge my phone at the same time. When it’s on full power I use the aux wire with the adapter. I can then finally talk on the phone and drive. Also the skip and play button doesn’t work when you use the aux, only when it’s connected to the USB port those buttons work.
customer_reviews.author: Dashiell Clark

customer_reviews.title: the head unit is good i didnt have any issues with install the reason ...
customer_reviews.text: the head unit is good i didnt have any issues with install the reason for 4 stars is that when i plug my usb cable into my android phone it wont read the media device so i have to use the aux cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jwsocal

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice stereo. Sounds good with the cheap amp I hooked it up to. Very easy to switch modes and adjust sound levels on. The only gripe I have is why include a remote. I like that I can plug my ipod or a usb stick into the front for mp3s. It also plays my old cds from the 90's without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a pain, but that was the car's fault (2003 Forester), not the Kenwood unit's. I found the interface for the USB track selection awkward, preset buttons small and crowded too close together, and tuner barely worked. Thought it had Bluetooth, but it was my fault for mixing up the description with another unit. I kept it because of price difficulties with installing, and being adequate for USB, my main use. Died after just 2 years, replaced with a Pioneer s4120bt, we'll see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: davis

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal, can't complain for the price. Bluetooth calling only seems to work with the phone connected via usb. The same for audio on your phone, must be connected via usb and only plays music from the SD card or internal storage in your phone via BT. Auxillary works great.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased stereo, installed next day only to find out that unit was bad. Stereo would come on, so I tried hooking up directly to battery thinking that maybe I had a bad connection in my harness. Unit still would not light up. I was so discouraged, because I spent 2 hours connecting new connectors to wiring harness. my truck was all torn apart, so I went to Auto Zone and purchased another one just so I would not have to put everything back together and then have to do it again, when the replacement came in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: Gerrit Jones

customer_reviews.title: Always work
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several of these over the years. They are great radios to throw in vehicles for selling or for using and abusing. They may not have the top of the line features but they simply work everyday.
customer_reviews.author: kyler

customer_reviews.title: So I pretty much wasted my money as my S8 will not ...
customer_reviews.text: What isn't really mentioned in the information is that this will only work with CERTAIN android phones. So I pretty much wasted my money as my S8 will not work with the USB, after I spent hours swapping this and rewiring the whole harness. I called Kenwood,they told me to use the AUX port, but it's all distorted at higher volumes. If my phone would work with this player, it'd be great. Otherwise, I spent $50 on an AUX port.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great radio great price ty it was packaged nicely I will enjoy it for many years to come
customer_reviews.author: Holly fisicaro

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with it although she would have probably loved it ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter's car. She is very happy with it although she would have probably loved it even more if we purchased the one with Bluetooth. I would recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works great once installed
customer_reviews.text: Once I got it installed, it works great and much better than the stock stereo that came in my car. Very good item for the quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: pappysproductions

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood quality, good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great, even with mediocre speakers. I thought it was the model that allowed you to change the color of the display. My fault for not making sure. The red and white color combination has grown onme just the same. After a couple weeks of listening and adjusting, I'm happy with it and would buy it again, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Scranton

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: This radio has a good quality sound. Its better than the one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: Loose faceplate
customer_reviews.text: The connection between the faceplate and the receiver is pretty loose. Leading to loss of sound and visuals. Pretty annoying at times. But it works well enough beyond that. Works great with my old iPod.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Most features for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the price, I put it in an old truck to replace a factory stereo and also have the Bluetooth version in my Harley. Kenwood has the best features for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shane J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Carry all your music in your car.
customer_reviews.text: Great car stereo for the music lover. I’ve packed almost all my music on a 32GB compact jump drive and love it.
customer_reviews.author: pixmakerdave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice replacement
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for a Furrion product that lasted just a few years in my travel trailer. Very easy to install. Good operating instructions and nice sound to match my 5 inch 30W speakers. Nice price point too! Thank you Kenwood!
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: If you listen to AM do not use this radio.
customer_reviews.text: The unit will not pick up local AM stations. FM is.excellent all other functions are great but the AM sucks static and weak on all my local talk stations to the point it is unusable on AM.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Luikart

customer_reviews.title: Good radio. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Good value. I rememeber not many years ago this would have been a 400 dollar radio.
customer_reviews.author: Aufan1

customer_reviews.title: Good radio
customer_reviews.text: Works well has a USB port right in it. the only difficulty installing it was my car not the radio.
customer_reviews.author: Jnewman22

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go into an older truck that we have to replace the stock radio that didn't work. Sounds great, easy to put in and looks good too! Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: HelenaMiss

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood Stereo
customer_reviews.text: I put this Kenwood in my 1979 GMC 4x4 ..so far it works great
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good, basic stereo that is def a step up from the stock radio.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about two years now. It shuts off randomly at times now, not a wiring issue. If I use the USB port it’ll keep disconnecting and reconnecting and on top of that if I don’t have my phone plugged in after using the usb I can’t switch back to radio or anything till I reconnect my phone again.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Stereo
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing with it was it was supposed to come with a remote but it was not in the box so I had to pay $20+ to order one that will work on it and wait another week to get it
customer_reviews.author: Rayann Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radio
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price, not flimsy like other radios. Controls are easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only single DIN I’ll ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these stereos in two different vehicles and I have no regrets or complaints. Although the stereo itself is great, if you have crap speakers then you’re going to get crap results. (It’s called a sound system because it all works together)...
customer_reviews.author: Kainoa

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Good price wish it was cheaper good options. My only problem with this radio, when I was looking and I asked them a few things about options they didn't answer me correctly. I thought about returning but it was just too much work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USB useless with android
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with radio and aux, but android USB is practically useless. You need to use their app which uses local content, so no luck if your main source if music is streaming apps.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: works good good sound good price easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: DCMO

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dads birthday its sounds great and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: tyler prine

customer_reviews.title: Put it a Home made radio box and love how it sounds and the functions work very easy
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for what I am using it for! Put it a Home made radio box and love how it sounds and the functions work very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Roadster32

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood quality at a low cost
customer_reviews.text: This Kenwood is the 2nd of the same model for a different car I bought it is a GREAT stereo and easy to install love the USB
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No Samsung Galaxy S8 compatibility. Gotta use an AUX connection.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I've always used Kenwood decks because they never disappoint. This is no exception
customer_reviews.text: I've always used Kenwood decks because they never disappoint. This is no exception. Love the new design and the clarity, adjustability, and ease of use are top notch. Replaced an Alpine unit in a Jeep I just bought and this blows it out of the water. Not too mention the price! This thing was cheap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this if you want your stereo to last
customer_reviews.text: Product was great initially. Now it is unresponsive to touch and keeps trying to reset
customer_reviews.author: kristina bruget

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use and has great sound. Little bit tough to install on a 2004 forester with manual switches but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use good sound quality, really a Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sounds great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: sounds outstanding and the lights that light up match the color of the inside of my truck
customer_reviews.author: mark d.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy install and I love the quality of sound. The display is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Firnekas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Used to replace in an RV and fits the bill. Not over the top for performance, but wasn't looking for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The tuner is a little bit weak but all the other features work well. It has easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: ya this rules so much. the buttons are a little small but youll get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: nice stereo
customer_reviews.text: very nice buy. I was impresses with clean and crisp sounds of instruments played. has true separated left / right sound.
customer_reviews.author: tbone and the blue notes

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Had to do a custom job for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to do a custom job for the install, but I knew that up front. Had an antennae wire which made replacing the factory stereo easy. Sounds great also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a downgrade in sound quality from the previous name brand receiver as soon as I turned it on. I tweaked every audio setting it had. Typically receivers in this price range are pretty much all the same. To get sound quality you have to pay at least $100. Unless you buy a separate amp you are stuck with dead sounding receiver. The previous receiver it replaced was $200 brand new
customer_reviews.author: Tall Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Solid head unit for the price easy install Con wish it was little bit louder
customer_reviews.author: Delma Maurice Kidd Walton

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if u have type c charger cord
customer_reviews.text: I installed stereo and work great until I plugged my Samsung s8 into it.. it had me download Kenwood app then it freaked out and ruined my sound on my phone! Now only have half sound for ringers and videos won't play on my phone and phone battery ruined!
customer_reviews.author: The Don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stereo works great and looks good in the truck!
customer_reviews.author: Kalan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: drive with satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: best stereo for a great price, so much connectivity options even stream pandora and iheart radio, audio sounds fantastic even radio quality, even put all your favorite songs on a flash drive and just let it play
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hollar

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This unit preforms great, fit easily into the adapter. I would recommend this audio unit if your on a budget and want a lot for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy as pie to install, works great. Only thing I would want different is bigger buttons. They are really tiny. Love the USB!
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It's a great stereo but the only reason we had to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great stereo but the only reason we had to purchase it was to replace the face that my grandson threw away! Wish you just sold the faces!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this product, but disappointed because it does not have the option to adjust sub output
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and as withstand the off-road driving I ...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and as withstand the off-road driving I do. The only reason why I only gave it 4 stars. It was a pain in the ass to program it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Radio did not work when installed
customer_reviews.text: I had recently installed this radio and after hooking up the radio it did not turn on, all wires were connected properly and the radio still did not work. I was given a defective radio
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Geis

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Was sent a defective unit all wiring was correct didn't work
customer_reviews.author: zeusthedoggie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No I really don't want it at all because it doesn't have any sub jacks
customer_reviews.author: Dirk E.

customer_reviews.title: Very small buttons and is difficult to press the presets ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small buttons and is difficult to press the presets. Installed it and ran the yellow wire to the battery, but each time I start the vehicle, it still ask for the language, do I want the demo, etc. Does not retain bass settings, etc. Not sure what to do with it. Have to press 6 to 10 buttons first to get to tuner to just get the radio to play. Then, have to redo my audio settings Buttons are not clear on what does what.
customer_reviews.author: E. Snow

customer_reviews.title: I received two car stereos on my original order, ...
customer_reviews.text: I received two car stereos on my original order, I ask for a refund on the first one but haven’t received it, now I’m asking for refund on the other radio, it does not fit my vehicle. Need a refund on both items please.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kenwood head unit
customer_reviews.text: Yes. This Kenwood unit is pretty awesome for what it is. Hooks right up to my iPhone (USB) simply and without problem. Can control iPhone through receiver itself or through iPhone. Plays CDs quickly and reliably (even CDs with scratches that have trouble playing on other players). This unit is simple to use, logically laid out, and easy to see/read during glaring sun or dark of night. I am using this to power factory speakers in my car, so it handles that job well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a great value
customer_reviews.text: I replaced by low-end Dual system with this Pioneer, and the sound is so much better. The beauty of it is that this system cost me under $60. It's in an older Eclipse Spyder, so I didn't order the Bluetooth version for $30 more. The sound is great, it has all the connections I need to run my iPhone and various MP3 players for my own playlists, and it fit perfectly in the dash. The wiring was simple and marked well. First Pioneer I have had in decades, and I am very happy with the sound I got for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Aruba guy

customer_reviews.title: dialing it in!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a lot of power! It also has many settings! its a little confusing setting up! seems to be a good unit! I find myself messing with the treble and bass a lot! .Maybe I'm just having trouble dialing it in! although sounds good for the most part!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with awesome features!
customer_reviews.text: This thing should cost double what they charge for all the features it has! Excellent purchase and my stereo sounds awesome now! And it's a Kenwood so what's not to love about it. A friend who is a car stereo nuts told me about this head unit and he was right. It's also about 30 dollars cheaper here on Amazon. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: N Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Wow factor
customer_reviews.text: This radio is awesomely amazing Can't believe how great it sounds. I definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: zebadiah coleman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reception.
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome radio, especially for the price. It's loaded with features of more expensive models. The sound is crisp, clear, even at higher volumes. Look no further. Update: If I could do it over again, I would not buy this radio. It plays CD's fine, but if you get just a few miles away from the station it gets no reception at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great economy headunit
customer_reviews.text: If you can skip playing CD I would look for a short chassis radio. They keep making it harder to squeeze everything into the dash.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood has all ways been a good brand, I like the easy functions and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Kenwood has all ways been a good brand, I like the easy functions and it has a remote. sounds good and easy to self install
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Was amazed at the quality of sound using the same speakers from previous radio/cd. Installed in my RV. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rabbi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome simple stereo that sounds very good and costs minimal. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jhunki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product..!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and great features. Install was straight forward and fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gant

customer_reviews.title: Works great. For the money you spend it does it’s job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the radio, only gripe is the harness isn’t in stores so you have to order separate. But it’s installed nonetheless and works great. Haven’t changed to many things from factory settings, I do wish I had a knob for changing stations.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice car stereo!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice car stereo! Great sound, especially for the price. I had it installed at a car stereo shop. They replaced my stock radio in my Acura RSX. When I picked up my car, WOW, sounded way better!!
customer_reviews.author: lgutz57

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older Kenwood. This was almost a plug n play.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 1 year and 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Works great for 1 yeaar and 2 months. After that doesn't turn on anymore. Warranty is only 1 year.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Has updated features like USB port for MP3 or to charge phone.

customer_reviews.title: great stereo
customer_reviews.text: the remote worked ok?, and the stereo was great never any problems, sold the van and miss the stereo might buy another one again!

customer_reviews.title: Great little head unit.
customer_reviews.text: Great head unit for the money, put in a low budget system and for wll under $200, got some great sound in my car.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had the radio since June of last year. Been working good since. Had no issues when installing or after. The sound is clear and the stations come in fine. Adjusting audio control is great. The remote is so helpful.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to all very Satisfied.....

customer_reviews.text: Provides great options and reads me information from my iphone 7+. Remote is easy to use and very helpful when driving. Great product!

customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Not a very expensive radio, but it's worth the price. I can't complain!

customer_reviews.text: This quality stereo has everything I need, usb, CD Bluetooth, and the sound quality is really outstanding.

customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it was the radio overall or just this particular one, but it stopped working after a week.

customer_reviews.text: I buy this model for all my cars. Good sound and lots of adjustments

customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, awesome product. Sounds great with amp and high end speakers too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my wifes Rodeo fit perfect and works!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: Radio works great. Great price. I replaced an older Kenwood radio. This one is very similar to operate and has a few upgrades, not worth mentioning. The old remote control works with the new radio so I am using the old remote. The buttons are better than the old unit, they poke out more so can be felt easier. I have way more control over the sub-woofer settings too. Many options here. Easy to install when I bought the wiring harness for my particular vehicle, highly recommend getting the harness, sold separate.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the radio, I sent another country Ecuador and fit perfectly

customer_reviews.text: Can't change color of the light like it is indicated on the description. Kenwood app is flaky and you are unable to browse to your playlist.

customer_reviews.title: It sounds good. Decent power for the money. It works with my iPhone and charges it.

customer_reviews.text: I have installed 4 of these in my vehicles. Great sound.
